title: Large Language Models Applied to Healthcare Tasks May Improve Clinical Efficiency, Value of Care Rendered, Research, and Medical Education.

abstract: Abstract Large Language Models (LLM) are generative artificial intelligence (AI) models that create content based on the data on which it was trained. Processing capabilities have evolved from text-only to being multimodal including text, images …

title: Student Use of Electronic Health Records to Inform Decision-Making: A Pilot Study
details: S Calonder, A Woda - Journal of Nursing Education, 2024
abstract: Background As health care continues to evolve, the electronic medical record (EHR) has emerged as an important decision-making tool. To ensure that nursing students work toward competency with the EHR, this study sought to gather information …
